body:
Features and Enhancements

Cost Analysis
  • Non-Par Reallocation
    • The non-par reallocation strategy is the method by which reallocation candidates are identified and selected for providers who are not participating in the cost analysis network.
    • This release introduces:
      • Driving Distance as an option
      • Urbanization Types of USR and CBSA to allow more fidelity in finding in-network provider candidates.
  • Analysis Filter Criteria
    • This section is redesigned to support multiple utilization data filters that apply to ALL results:
      • Utilization member geography
      • Claim Type
      • Place of Service
      • Utilization Provider Specialty
  • New Reallocation Group-level Summary
    • This new section allows the user to delve into the details of the reallocation based on the Groups involved.
    • Also, the user can see the details for each PAR group.

Issues Fixed

Component
  • Issue
    • Fixed an issue with Population Files where an admin user could not use a private Population File
    • Fixed an issue with a large Measure Access Full Zips CSV export that was failing for large population files
